Package edu.rpi.legup.ui

  • Class
    Description
    CreatePuzzleDialog
    Provides the user interface components for creating a new puzzle in the Legup application.
    DynamicView
    A JPanel that provides a dynamic view with zooming capabilities for different types of content.
    DynamicViewType
    An enumeration representing the different types of dynamic views supported by the application.
    HomePanel
    The HomePanel class represents the home panel of the LEGUP application.
    LegupPanel
    An abstract base class for panels in the LEGUP application.
    LegupUI
    The main user interface class for the LEGUP application.
    ManualPuzzleCreatorDialog
     
    PickGameDialog
    A dialog for selecting a game.
    PreferencesDialog
    A dialog for managing user preferences in the LEGUP application.
    ProofEditorPanel
    ProofEditorPanel is a panel that serves as the main user interface component for the proof editing functionality of LEGUP.
    PuzzleEditorPanel
    Represents the panel used for puzzle editor in the LEGUP.
    ScrollView
    ScrollView extends JScrollPane to provide a customizable view with zoom and scroll capabilities.
    ToolbarName
    This enum defines constants for toolbar names used in the user interface.
    WrapLayout
    FlowLayout subclass that fully supports wrapping of components.
    ZoomablePane
    The ZoomablePane class is used to display components in a zoomable and scalable manner.
    ZoomWidget
    The ZoomWidget displays a zoom icon that, when clicked, shows a popup slider to adjust the zoom level of the associated ScrollView.
